biotools.summary: QUARTERplus (QUality Assessment for pRotein inTrinsic disordEr pRedictions.) webserver provides accurate intrinsic disorder predictions using a novel meta-model that are accompanied by interpretable quality assessment (QA) scores. QA scores quantify the quality of the associated disorder predictions for each amino acid in the input sequence.
